practice_phrases: He couldn't.
他不能。
I think he couldn't.
我觉得他不能。
She said he couldn't.
她说他不能。
He couldn't sit down.
他不能坐下。
I think he couldn't work from home.
我觉得他不能在家工作。
She said he couldn't show you that.
她说他不能给你看那个。
I think he couldn't write about that young woman.
我觉得他不能写关于那个年轻女人。
She said he couldn't talk to your mother about that.
她说他不能和你妈妈谈关于那个。
I think he couldn't write a story about that man over there.
我觉得他不能写一个关于那边那个男人的故事。
She said he couldn't live in that city before.
她说他以前不能住在那个城市里。
He couldn't believe that.
他不能相信那个。
I think he couldn't believe that.
我觉得他不能相信那个。
She said he couldn't believe that.
她说他不能相信那个。
He couldn't believe that story.
他不能相信那个故事。
I think he couldn't believe that young woman.
我觉得他不能相信那个年轻女人。
She said he couldn't believe your mother's friend.
她说他不能相信你妈妈的朋友。
He couldn't believe that woman who's talking to your friend.
他不能相信那个正在和你朋友说话的女人。
I think he couldn't believe that story about that man.
我觉得他不能相信那个关于那个男人的故事。
She said he couldn't believe that young man over there.
她说他不能相信那边那个年轻男人。
He couldn't believe that story about the woman who's sitting over there.
他不能相信那个关于那个坐在那边的女人的故事。
I believe that.
我相信那个。
She believes that.
她相信那个。
I think I believe that.
我觉得我相信那个。
She said she believes that.
她说她相信那个。
I don't believe that young woman.
我不相信那个年轻女人。
She said she can believe that story.
她说她可以相信那个故事。
I think that man believes your mother's friend.
我觉得那个男人相信你妈妈的朋友。
He said he can believe that woman over there.
他说他可以相信那边那个女人。
I think she believes that story about that young man.
我觉得她相信那个关于那个年轻男人的故事。
She said that young woman doesn't believe the man who's talking to your friend.
她说那个年轻女人不相信那个正在和你朋友说话的男人。
The three most important facts.
三个最重要的事实。
Those are the three most important facts.
那些是三个最重要的事实。
She said those are the three most important facts.
她说那些是三个最重要的事实。
I think those are the three most important facts.
我觉得那些是三个最重要的事实。
He can write about the three most important facts.
他可以写关于三个最重要的事实。
She said that woman knows the three most important facts.
她说那个女人知道三个最重要的事实。
I think that young man can believe the three most important facts.
我觉得那个年轻男人可以相信三个最重要的事实。
He said she could write a story about the three most important facts.
他说她可以写一个关于三个最重要的事实的故事。
I think that woman could show you the three most important facts before.
我觉得那个女人以前可以给你看三个最重要的事实。
She said that young woman knows the three most important facts about that city.
她说那个年轻女人知道关于那个城市的三个最重要的事实。
Most important facts.
最重要的事实。
The most important facts.
最重要的事实。
She knows the most important facts.
她知道最重要的事实。
I think those are the most important facts.
我觉得那些是最重要的事实。
He said those are the most important facts.
他说那些是最重要的事实。
I think she can write about the most important facts.
我觉得她可以写关于最重要的事实。
She said that young woman knows the most important facts about that.
她说那个年轻女人知道关于那个的最重要的事实。
He said that man can show you the most important facts.
他说那个男人可以给你看最重要的事实。
I think that story is about the most important facts about that city.
我觉得那个故事是关于那个城市的最重要的事实。
She said that young man could write about the most important facts before.
她说那个年轻男人以前可以写关于最重要的事实。
Facts.
事实。
Important facts.
重要的事实。
She knows those facts.
她知道那些事实。
I think those are important facts.
我觉得那些是重要的事实。
He said those are important facts about that city.
他说那些是关于那个城市的重要的事实。
She can write about those facts at home.
她可以在家写关于那些事实。
I think that young woman knows the important facts about that.
我觉得那个年轻女人知道关于那个的重要的事实。
He said that man could show you the facts before.
他说那个男人以前可以给你看事实。
She said that story is about the important facts about that young man.
她说那个故事是关于那个年轻男人的重要的事实。
He couldn't believe the three most important facts.
他不能相信三个最重要的事实。
